title: Shen will give 100% dodge to his allies

replies.body:
{{champion:98}} "JAX GO TO MY SPIRIT REFUGE!!!"
{{champion:24}} "I don't need your stupid dodge shield."
{{champion:98}} :(
Jax/Shen tensions are at an all time high.
I just thought about a 1v1 shen/jax URF match...
And no damage was done that day.
Legends say the Grandmaster at Arms and the Grandmaster of typical ninja Yandere animes are still fighting to this day, never growing weary...

What happens when Shen uses it on an ally Jax who is already dodging? Does he dodge into the shots at that point? or does his dodge evolve to the point he can dodge existing for a little while? the world may never know... until Shen rework is released...
The dodges warp space time and send the shots back at the attacker.

Dark matter spews out of the spirit sword and falls down violently in ANY random place on the map. A magical barrier(event horizon) is formed around {{champion:98}} and{{champion:24}}  and baleful strikes spew out of the event horizon. At the final moment of the synchronized {{champion:98}} W and {{champion:24}} E a primordial burst explodes violently in the center of {{champion:24}} and{{champion:98}} . It deals true damage.
and people used to complain about windwall...
No, people use to complain about {{champion:17}} .

> [{quoted}](name=DrCyanide,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=x4lEPhZx,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-01-13T19:31:27.479+0000)
>
> No, people use to complain about {{champion:17}} .

Yea I remember those days lol.
90' kids will remember
People used to complain about {{champion:22}}
Windwall is much, much worse, Shen won't block your ulti.

> [{quoted}](name=BigBadBadger,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=x4lEPhZx,comment-id=00010001,timestamp=2016-01-13T19:47:36.487+0000)
>
> Windwall is much, much worse, Shen won't block your ulti.

Unless you're Twitch. :(
Poor fella.
or vayne - I get a 75 damage boost except none of it hits!
No one feels sorry about that that
I think the rework is starting to grow on me, now...
Unless you're Warwick
it won't block the supress and the damage from warwick's ult, though it might block the 5 onhit applications

> [{quoted}](name=RespectPlus,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=x4lEPhZx,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-01-13T19:30:48.994+0000)
>
> and people used to complain about windwall...

Windwall blocks skillshots and ultimates while lasting ~3x as long as this. Not comparable.

Windwall is also easier to use.
By the look of it, Shen can only position the sword with Q.
Yas can throw wind wall where ever the hell he pleases.

> [{quoted}](name=RespectPlus,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=x4lEPhZx,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-01-13T19:30:48.994+0000)
>
> and people used to complain about windwall...

windwall block spells+attack

> [{quoted}](name=playfive Koopska,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=x4lEPhZx,comment-id=00010002,timestamp=2016-01-13T20:07:17.564+0000)
>
> windwall block spells+attack

correction windwall blocks projectiles. not all spells and attacks can be blocked. like malzahars e or karthus ult or fioras attack.

any animation that involves going from point a to point b to do damage is considered a projectile. so any marksmen or ranged mage auto attacks will be blocked and any projectile spells.
Support Shen incoming

That was already a thing.

Now it just goes straight to the fucking extreme.

Pray to god you got a good support, ADC mains

I dunno..personally I'd rather have free ranged harass and the ability to provide sustain to myself/my lane partner over gimmicky auto dodge shield, but we'll see how it all shakes out. I'm sure I'll keep playing shen anyway.
Yeah, kinda sucks that Shen top is going to be much harder (or at the very least, you'll need to commit a lot more to trades), but I'll wait until this hit PBE/Live before I judge

Shen was really, really annoying top just spamming Q on everything, and using his E to either get outta dodge when you/your jungler engages, or to engage whenever he feels like. Now he has to commit to do anything. He feels more mystical ninja-y.
Especially in an ADC based meta, dodging basic attacks is a fun and interesting way to use CC to get them out of it or be forced to wait longer for a teamfight.
Lmao adc meta. Do you even play this game?

> [{quoted}](name=ybuR,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=x4lEPhZx,comment-id=00030001,timestamp=2016-01-13T22:29:39.034+0000)
>
> Lmao adc meta. Do you even play this game?

Yeah.

There is a reason why MF, Corki, Graves, Kog, Quinn and I think someone else got a rework. They want ADCs to truly shine this meta. Which is why there is more emphasis on MF ulti being able to crit, Corki's new passive etc.

ADC SHINE IN THIS META LOL

Holy LOL who upvoted you? 

Every single adc itemization was nerfed except for mercurial.
What in the fuck are you smoking and where do I acquire some?
What do you disagree with edgelord? Oh support main i know what im dealing with now

adc itemization nerfed??? ok yeah IE gives 15 less AD but it's cheaper and you don't need to complete it right off the bat.

BF sword is more accessible for first backs, no more stupid avarice blade, mercurial gives lifesteal, more crit on trinity force, essence reaver for additional scaling with crit...

I could go on, but, I'll trust that you get the point, and won't.

Old essence reaver was better as a first buy than the new one. New one needs 2nd crit item, then it is better. But I agree that adc's have it a lot better than some others and have no reason to complain about item changes.
{{champion:23}} What? A counter to me!?

The only counter to you is RNGesus.
Unfortunately for everybody, Tryndamere is the chosen prophet.

Oh well. I guess there's always ~~Satan~~ Teemo.
Doesn't Pantheon counter him?

{{champion:80}} 
"you can't crit me if you can't attack!"

{{champion:23}} You have mana costs? bummer dude.
You can't heal? Bummer dude.

Pantheon isn't really a hard counter. Pre-6 pantheon just bursts him for a lot of health (that's.... kinda panth's thing).
Shen / Yasuo / Kjndred combo... you will never die... the ultimate combo.

> [{quoted}](name=TeemoJenkins,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=x4lEPhZx,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-01-13T19:30:16.796+0000)
>
> Shen / Yasuo / Kjndred combo... you will never die... the ultimate combo.

{{champion:432}} ? {{champion:16}} ?
{{champion:201}} ? {{champion:26}} ?
{{champion:223}} ?
{{champion:10}} ?

{{champion:67}} Time to GET KILLS
{{champion:98}} No.
{{champion:67}} D:

{{champion:67}}: HAH HAH! I got you now!

{{champion:98}}: ...

{{champion:67}}: What?!? Why aren't you dead yet?

{{champion:98}}: Hey, Vayne.

{{champion:67}}: What?

{{champion:98}}: I guess your attacks...

{{champion:67}}: Oh, no. Don't you-

{{champion:98}}: ARE IN VAYNE!!! NYEHEHEHEHEH!

{{champion:67}} **A summoner has disconnected.**
